select d.id,d.dicName,d.dicCode,d.dicValue,d.dicParent,d.dicType,ds.typeName,pd.dicName as dicParentName from Dictionarys d right join DictionaryType ds on ds.id=d.dicType left join Dictionarys pd on d.dicParent=pd.id where 1=1
and ds.typeName like CONCAT('%',#{typeName},'%')
and d.dicName like CONCAT('%',#{dicName},'%')
order by ID limit #{begin},#{pageNum};
SELECT DISTINCT d1.id,d1.dicName,d1.dicCode,d1.dicValue,d1.dicParent,d1.dicType FROM Dictionarys d1 LEFT JOIN Dictionarys d2 on d1.id = d2.dicParent
SELECT id,dicName,dicCode,dicValue,dicParent,dicType FROM Dictionarys WHERE dicParent=#{id} limit 5
SELECT DISTINCT d.DicName,d.DicCode,d.DicParent,d.DicType,d.DicValue,d.ID from Dictionarys d INNER JOIN Dictionarys ds WHERE d.DicParent = #{id}
SELECT d.ID,d.DicName,d.DicCode,d.DicValue,d.DicParent,d.DicType from Dictionarys d WHERE d.DicParent is null and d.id != 40
